mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from(SELECT inquiry_no,inquiry_title,to_char(inquiry_reg_date)as inquiry_reg_date,inquiry_type, member_email from inquiry order by inquiry_no desc)b) where rnum BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
select inquiry_comment_no, INQUIRY_COMMENT_CONTENT,INQUIRY_COMMENT_REG_DATE,MEMBER_EMAIL from inquiry_comment where inquiry_no=#{inquiryNo} order by inquiry_comment_reg_date
mapper.update: update inquiry set inquiry_title=#{inquiryTitle}, inquiry_content=#{inquiryContent}, inquiry_type=#{inquiryType} where inquiry_no=#{inquiryNo}
